RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the border checkpoint: border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: the government seeking review in the case of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location where a federal grand jury returned an indictment and where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was stopped by a border patrol checkpoint, 15 miles south of which the checkpoint is located on I-35
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near La: checkpoint where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso's detention was argued to be unconstitutionally lengthy
